description.en:
A Collection of 5 Short Stories.
Story 1 - Follows a boy named Shingo KANOU who gets a job working as a servant for a rich girl named Serene.

Story 2 -
Is a love triangle about 2 best friends who fall in love with the same boy.

Story 3 - A story about a girl who has monolids and normally fakes double lids. She wanted to confess to her boyfriend about having monolids when she realized she won't be hated for it, but her boyfriend then reveals that he dislikes liars and people who hide things, which causes her to think twice and go to extremes to hide her secret of having single eyelids...

Story 4 - About a shy and cute girl who is part of the drama club at her school. She has a crush on the lead actor who is playing a role in the production of Cinderella. And by accident finds herself playing Cinderella opposite the boy she loves.

Story 5 - "When I'm alone on Christmas Eve, he always by my side...".
Chise always believe in Santa Claus, so when Santa himself comes and asks her to succeed him as Santa Claus, she agree to do it. But then, tomorrow is her boyfriend's christmas party, can she still become santa?
